channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-length (0.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for a smart line length validation.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-quotes (3.3)
item.description: Flake8 lint for quotes.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-required-keyword-arguments (0.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin to check for for the presense of missing required keyword arguments

item.title: Updated: sentry-flake8 (2)
item.description: Sentry's custom flake8 checker plugin.

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (1.1.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.

item.title: Updated: flake8-comprehensions (3.6.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to help you write better list/set/dict comprehensions.

item.title: Updated: flake8-too-many (0.1.1)
